name: Escape Scary Dog
description:
Welcome to Escape Scary Ben.

Ben keeps you locked in his house.
Now you have to try to get out of his house, but be careful and quiet. He hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, he hears it and comes running.
You can hide in chests or under beds.
You have 5 lifes.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.
